title: Megapotency 10MM Remedy Kit (13) 1/2 dram
cleaned_text: Description Megapotency 10MM Remedy Kit (13) 1/2 dram each NO SPECIFIC DOSING INSTRUCTIONS ARE PROVIDED WITH THIS KIT. Please contact a [professional Homeopath](https://homeopathicremediesonline.com/homeopathic-practitioner/) for paid individualized dosing regarding the supervised use of mega potencies. Megapotency 10MM = 10,000,000C This kit contains the following mega potency remedies using medicating tinctures on sucrose pills that are made on a radionics machine (Rad.). There are 75+ per 1/2 dram vial: - Aconitum Napellus
